clients.title: Google+ Social Network Sunsetting in August 2019
description: Google has announced that it is sunsetting the Google+ social network in August 2019. If you have a website or blog with us that links to your G+ profile, there's no need to worry as we are currently updating all sites and blogs in relation to this. If you'd like to read more of the history of Google's social networks and how they have evolved, check out our blog post here.

jld.title: At Justia, We Build Law Firm Websites That Are Responsive, Mobile-Friendly, and AMP Enabled
description: Our commitment to high-quality, relevant websites will help you attract clients in the practice areas and locations most important to your firm. We also offer Premium Membership on the Justia & LII Lawyer directories.

If you're interested in our website and SEO services, Premium membership opportunities, or if you would just like to learn more about what we have to offer, contact one of our marketing specialists today.
